newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish 52-week T-bill minimum price down at tender.
newsitem.headline: Polish 52-week T-bill minimum price down at tender.

text.p: The minimum price of Poland's 52-week T-bill eased to 82.03 at today's primary tender from 82.04 on Monday as banks bid for 242 million zlotys against a 600 million zloty offer, the finance ministry said.
The average price was 82.03 and the maximum was 82.16.
The finance ministry sold 109 million of the paper.
It also said it would offer 1.1 billion zlotys worth of T-bills at its next primary auction on Monday, June 30.
On Monday the treasury will offer 700 million zlotys of 52-week T-bills, 200 million of 26-week and 200 million of its 13-week paper. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
